Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 80th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Timothy Egerton (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Agustin Vega (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2017, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2017, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/20/2017...
Sets a new season AL-Record for Hits with 228 on 10/2/2017...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/26/2018...
Injured on 7/29/2018 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/2019 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/2/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 8/2/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 9/20/2020...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
